website_summaries.verdict: A small tracking device that discreetly keeps tabs on cars, kids, and adults with iPhone and Android accessibility.
pros: Can be used with a USB port to extend battery life — which seems to last longer than similarly priced trackers
Easy to set up and keep updated, and a relatively low-cost monthly subscription
Can set alerts to notify when tracker has gone outside boundaries
cons: Some report the trip reporting is a little spotty, with a single journey spread out over several reports

customer_reviews.title: Experienced user
customer_reviews.text: I use portable tracking units regularly. From high priced ones ($1000) to Mid all the way down to "throw-aways) this Tracker has surprised me so much. It is very accurate and is a work horse. Battery life is better then any others in its range. Customer Service is FAST, FRIENDLY and actually know what they are talking about. Very impressed with the service and hardware. I have over 20 of these units by the way, so I know a thing or 2 about them lol.
customer_reviews.author: At1980

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT...so far!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and the magnetic box holder a couple of days ago for a family member who suspected their spouse was cheating. After reading the reviews, I was skeptical, but I can honestly say, I LOVE IT and so for now, my family member does too. Ater just one day of use on the spouse's vehicle, my family member has gathered priceless information. I'd highly recommend it to track anyone or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Jackson

customer_reviews.title: So glad to feel better about my thoughts
customer_reviews.text: Tracker worked amazingly, less than a week to get what i needed from it. Have already recommended to others. This thing is no joke! Does EXACTLY as intended. Will add a photo for size
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Keep it cool...
customer_reviews.text: I like its size and am using it to track the safety of a personal possession.Battery life is long and seemed fairly reliable until today when the heat (?) seemed to cut it off ccompletely and my item was lost track of all together for some time. That was very disconcerting.
customer_reviews.author: lawsons

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I used the Amcrest GPS for almost 6 months now overseas. It works great. I used other GPS devices in the past that could not operate very well overseas. I had no issues so far with this device. It is is fairly accurate.
customer_reviews.author: BI K DJASSA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Seamless Activation
customer_reviews.text: This was by far the easiest GPS system I have brought on-line (previously tried ~6. Good quality, good service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... live GPS Tracker and designed well to make it easy to keep track of anything that you want to ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a tiny live GPS Tracker and designed well to make it easy to keep track of anything that you want to track. The small size but a longer battery life about 10-14 days made I like it so much. It will be more continent for me to use it when I have a travel with my family.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: To avoid unneeded alerts, set device to "changes coordinates".
customer_reviews.text: This product is a ready-to-go product once activated. Paired with the protective container it is by far the best tracking device I have used to date. Just charge the device, activate it, turn the power on, insert it in the nearly indestructible case and you are ready to go tracking! The two earth magnets make it simple when placing the device on a vehicle out of sight. Trust me, I put it to the test with bumps, jumps, and collisions. These magnets are super strong. They will not let go. I will be purchasing about 4 more of these soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: This is a smart little device. It does what it supposed to do. However, the time it takes to actualize is a little slower. Some times the location is not as accurate as it should. It needs a some tuning up but overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: angel-mayor

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Subscription
customer_reviews.text: 1. I liked the ease of use for the PC and android app. 2. The battery life was pretty good. It lasted for about 10 days before it ran out. 3. Accuracy of GPS location was not as accurate as the Optimus but I like the extra features of the Amrest I'll buy again for family.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: great location tracking device , long battery life, bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Used this to keep track of my boat in storage , would trigger the device if someone got in and rocked the boat slightly . I was having work done on it and would know when the boat was being used . Well worth the money and battery life was great. Bought a second to keep track of a work vehicle . Showed perfect location on maps when in use
customer_reviews.author: Thomas schilling

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super accurate with location. I have had it now for a few months only a couple times did i have a network issue. Which the company was quick and resolved the issue. It helps me keep track of a car that needs to be tracked from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Toomey

customer_reviews.title: Tracks my every move with a mileage report as well!
customer_reviews.text: My GPS Tracker is great, I use mine to keep track of my claimable business miles, printable data is priceless. Great customer support as well. The couple times I contacted customer support, I was assisted and my questions were answered. All-in-all, just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: M Money

customer_reviews.title: Loved  it UNTIL!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I can track my husband I suspected that he was doing something behind my back. So I bought this and it was helpful it does work and it did allow me to see what I needed to see the only downside to this and why I wouldn’t purchase again is because he eventually suspected that I was up to something and he found it and he hid it and it’s somewhere in the house cause I could still see it here but unfortunately it cannot be paged which is something that would be useful so I would love to give it 5 stars but my money went to garbage
customer_reviews.author: Sweetcheekz

customer_reviews.title: ... the Amcrest Gps last week and so far so good. It keeps accurate location history and is easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased the Amcrest Gps last week and so far so good. It keeps accurate location history and is easy to use, The battery lasts a long time. I needed some answers and I am getting them thanks to my new Amcrest GPS tracker,. I love the size too, very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well! I like that it has a really long battery life. Battery stayed up for about a week. I used it for my 3yo son when he goes to school. He gets picked up by a sitter at the bus stop and i was able to track if he was able to make it home. Their app is on point!
customer_reviews.author: Jaderram

customer_reviews.title: Wicked fast response time
customer_reviews.text: Got the tracker for my classic Mustang. Wanted to get notifications when someone is shaking the vehicle. Work brilliantly fast. Quick response time on the app. Battery is good for about 12 days. Comes with boundary and speed alert as well as mail or text notifications. Great selection to individualize to my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Robster

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty cool, works extremely well. Just beware when you buy it you have to pay $20 (PER MONTH) to the company who makes it for it to actually track the person. It comes with a well designed app in my opinion very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bosco

customer_reviews.title: Battery life not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Useful product, unfortunate it only runs on 2g so it cuts out all around town. But my biggest complaint is the battery, being in a daily driven car that sits most of the day while at work, it loses about 20% charge per day. so roughly has to be recharged every 5 days. They say 10-14, but I don't see how thats possible with this device. Mounted under car in magnet box so its not deep in a trunk or something like that
customer_reviews.author: duane owen

customer_reviews.title: Just another white labeled tracker
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and used it for two months. Whats super creepy is that my history on my phone always says "amcrestgps" on it although I deleted the app and canceled the service about 8 months ago! I came to find researching others that many looked alike and figured out theyre all pretty much made by one or two manufacturers with a white label hosting service. Poor customer service is because its probably one or two folks and the English level in 2 support tickets was also pretty poor.
customer_reviews.author: Andruw18

customer_reviews.title: Warning!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this, Amcrest has the worst possible customer support I have ever dealt with. The device worked good at first so I bought 2 more. Now neither of my original devices work and I have been literally fighting with support for months and I do not see them resolving it, they just ignore anything I say and try to sell me new devices. You have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Lane

customer_reviews.title: Good and reliable
customer_reviews.text: What i liked about AM-GL300i it’s accurate, the battery life on a single charge is about 5 days. Small and reliable with real time GPS location and with really neat features. My only complaint is that while real time tracking is accurate it is based on a 60 second delay GPS tracking on map location, which in reality it not that bad but it can improve. Also the Amcrest mobile app is very good to navigate I personally don’t have any complaints for the mobile app. And the only reason why I stop using the Amcrest GPS device was simply because what I needed it for based on the information AM-GL300 was completed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark s. R

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: If you buy, you are on your own. I tried for 3 days to get my tracker to work. I looked up videos on You Tube, I contacted their support department. I downloaded the handbook and read it. I could not find a number to call for support. I was told to simply set it outside and wait. Duh like I haven't already done that. I also contacted the company before I bought the tracker to see what network is operated on to make sure it worked in my area. Needless to say I did my homework and still got burned.
customer_reviews.author: SABRINA

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel safe
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Able to track the cars and most importantly able to keep an eye on my sons driving. After the second over the speed limit email I talked with him and he has not sped again. Great knowing I not only know where he is but also if he is being safe
customer_reviews.author: craig s.

customer_reviews.title: Small, easy setup and very accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Small, easy setup and very accurate. Website tracker both online and via app is excellent. I have mine set to report every 60 seconds and so far it has been very accurate and reliable. This would be perfect to put in your teenage young adult's car or for a business owner for company cars for location tracking, the speed monitor is a little inconsistent if that is what you are looking for, but honestly I haven't looked into this feature much as it is not what I am concerned with. Overall, I am very happy with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: James G Harris Jr.

customer_reviews.title: There is a monthly charge, but it is well worth the benefit.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product after a failed attempt to steal my truck. I keep the Traker hidden inside the cab and it is so sensitive that just bumping the truck will alert me. It gives me a piece of mind knowing I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery C.

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy setup and I feel secure
customer_reviews.text: Just got it but so far I am VERY pleased. Took it out of the package and almost 20 minutes later and $20 later I am in business. Car theft is a huge thing in 707 California so I will need it. Anything happends, I will update.
customer_reviews.author: mike erwin

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It works well and the battery life is very good. Have only used it for my elderly forgetful aunt and to keep track of her. The geo-fence is a good feature as it alerts me as to anytime she leaves the area. The app works most times and I can use it to see where she is. I would have liked a "carry case" for this unit as there is no easy way to carry it on one's person unless you stick it in a pocket or pocketbook, where it can be easily lost. Please make a case for this !
customer_reviews.author: Milt

customer_reviews.title: Great tracker great price
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! It does exactly what it should and it does it well! Any issues and it’s easy to reach service techs to solve the problem! Best way to track those you love
customer_reviews.author: Blake's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good little tracker
customer_reviews.text: Plan is a little pricey, but keeps my little scooter safe. Good battery life, and hasn't had any issues in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: MoonMan

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with this one....
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.... small, accurate and battery life is as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cincotta

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Now I'm on day three, and the device still does not work. I guess you get what you pay for. Which, in this case, means a useless piece of plastic with blinking lights. For $80. I will be returning it, obviously. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: The Rooster

customer_reviews.title: May work for some, but not for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tracker to use at work, mapping a tour route. The tracker seems like it must see the sky or it won't log position changes. It also seems like it may be prone to metal interference. Anyway, I would not purchase again and will probably discontinue my subscription. I also did write to customer service asking if the frequency could be increased of the location, and received no response from them.
customer_reviews.author: Dsmith

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it works
customer_reviews.text: love the product it showed the location. didn't like that it took awhile to get the address of the location.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Worst product and company ever don't buy none of amcrest products
customer_reviews.text: I have a year warranty and they won't honor all types of excuses
customer_reviews.author: ngari cadogan

customer_reviews.title: Precision is great, and service is affordable
customer_reviews.text: Accurate tracking, I send this with my child on field trips. It gives me tremendous peace of mind to be able to see the actual location. Precision is great, and service is affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Tax Lady

customer_reviews.title: Spot on accuracy
customer_reviews.text: The location accuracy is spot on. Don't expect real time updates. Wait 5 minutes and the updates appear. This unit leaves a breadcrumb trail every minute, so even when not sending an update it still shows where it's been. I've used this in "no cell service areas and it still seams to leave a breadcrumb trail with exact times.
customer_reviews.author: chessie

customer_reviews.title: Works 1 day n not the next
customer_reviews.text: Got product in timely fashion. Registered it and set up payment. Then it hasnt really worked at all. Did everyrhing i was supposed to. Idk
customer_reviews.author: Tom L.

customer_reviews.title: Location Location Location
customer_reviews.text: The item is durable and fits in the palm or your hand. Battery life is sufficient. The device is not easily detected. I can track my vehicles whenever necessary. Locator is within a block or exact location. Customer support has been great in helping me with any issues. Can't wait for their next product!
customer_reviews.author: SR60

customer_reviews.title: Great Item. Totally Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great device. Helped me catch my wife (now ex) cheating on me. Thanks a million! Sometimes it would drop off the grid but their tech support quickly resolves any issues which are few and far between. Excellent app for your phone where you can name separate devices. Charge lasts about a week for moderate amount of driving. I recommend getting two devices and changing them out every 5 or 6 days. Use a monster magnet case to put anywhere there's metal with relative ease.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great little device with good battery
customer_reviews.text: I use it to track my kid ‘s school bus. Its peferctly fine when u ok with 3-5 min delay.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: AM-GL300
customer_reviews.text: The device works fine, however, your support is terrible. This is my second AM-GL300 because the first would not charge. I requested an RMA and all I got was nothing but a run-around. After your support asks me to send a 3rd RMA it became very clear they had no intentions of replacing the device. Therefore, extremely frustrated I just bought another AM-GL300. If I have trouble with this device and your support, I will buy from another company and write a harsh comment to Amazon for all potential buyers to read.
customer_reviews.author: mitch wilson

customer_reviews.title: Helped confirm affair
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent and helped to confirm the affair that I long suspected my wife of having. Battery life is excellent but I had it refresh every minute instead of every 15 or 30 seconds so I’m sure it’s much shorter otherwise. The alerts I received via text and notifications were excellent and precise. Such a life changing product and now I can move on with my life!
customer_reviews.author: jjsigpi

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Portable, easy to use, no contact, wish I had this on my trailer when it was stolen.
customer_reviews.author: JWB

customer_reviews.title: You have to buy a monthly plan, if you don't it is just junk
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to pay another data plan, I already have one and it is of other company. If you want to use this amcrest device you just have one option. You have to buy the amcrest plan (20DLLS p.m.) and use their platform. Otherwise it wont work. I didn't notice of this before my purchase :(
customer_reviews.author: Korsario

customer_reviews.title: It’s works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate, at least for the final location. Gave an exact address. I was very impressed and satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: The app takes a long time to load. For the past two weeks I've had on and off problems where the location will not update for days. This is not worth the $20 a month for unreliable service.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Best monthly price.
customer_reviews.text: Great little gps, doesn't lag on the signal and lasts me about 3-4 days on a full charge and medium amount of motion. Online portal is easy to use too.
customer_reviews.author: omar b

customer_reviews.title: Better luck with the new one.
customer_reviews.text: So far can’t get it to work and product support has been a stonewall. With the help of customer support worked out the issues and very satisfied with the way the products working now.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Stlouis

customer_reviews.title: Confusing
customer_reviews.text: Not trustworthy. Very disappointed. Does not track in real time only stop and start. In fact , if you at a red light that will be a stop then a start. Sometimes only a stop. Will give nearest address. My garage was listed as my neighbors address
customer_reviews.author: RADONE

customer_reviews.title: Busted
customer_reviews.text: She said she was going to visit her daughter for a week. She’s just outside Atlanta instead of her daughters house in Florida and has been for 2 days. Gives me a week to empty the house. Best money I ever spent. She left 3 days ago and battery is still over 80%
customer_reviews.author: Steve Masters

customer_reviews.title: Works when in cell tower range.
customer_reviews.text: I used this mainly for theft protection on my property, but also tried using as a live hiking tracker in the mountains. Does not work for hiking use, since the unit only reports when in range to cell reception. So, optimal use is for tracking in areas that have good cell reception.
customer_reviews.author: Jim and Nora Sykora

customer_reviews.title: Warning
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy... Does not work. Never saw my current location and only showed some location in China. Very Disappointed. The only reason I add a star was the only why to rate... honestly I would have not checked any star.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Reliable but battery life could be a bit better. I like the notices of speed, battery life, so it doesn’t get you by surprise. I give it a good rating overall. I’ll keep on using the product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Better coverage than 4G
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased the 4G version. Where the vehicle I'm tracking travels it had spotty coverage. I decided to try the 2G. Much better! Coverage is almost 100%. Not to mention that the power consumption is half that of the 4G. The external battery pack will last for months now. Not sure what I'm going to do with the 4G unit.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence J. Williams II

customer_reviews.title: How much it doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I wasted 2 hours trying to register this product and during that process it would ask for the "Order ID". In this case it was from Amazon and after inputting in the Order ID # i would pass my mouse cursor over the :Next" button and i always got a error symbol. Tried contacting support and didn't get a reply. A total waste of money. Don't buy it, it will just waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Device doesn’t work. Neither does tech support.
customer_reviews.text: Device never worked from the beginning. Left visible to the sky for days. Multiple restarts. Nothing. Tech support could of just sent a new one out right away? Nope, waste days of your time. They didn’t have a problem charging you money right away though. Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device!
customer_reviews.text: It's accurate and perfect for tracking anyone. It tells you driving speed , location, battery life and it refreshes every minute. not expensive at all for the purposes of giving you a peaceful mind. Would definitely buy again. It helped to track someone who was lying to me and so I'm so thankful for this device. You will not regret purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small Size, Works Well, a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: This Real-Time GPS Tracker worked great for tracking sensitive packages being delivered via couriers. I wish the service fee was less expensive per month, or I could activate it a la carte. The battery lasts a decent amount of time. The web portal and app could use some refinements, especially for new registrations.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: This product is very helpful and surprisingly accurate. The Amcrest app is super easy to use and has every needed option for the basic everyday user. I also purchased the magnetic waterproof case and place it underneath the vehicle without it effecting the signal or accuracy. For the price, it's definitely outstood my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Marsh

customer_reviews.title: handy gadget
customer_reviews.text: i have bought the device to use it in US and South america for two purposes: 1- for tracking my luggage 2- for tracking my 3 year old child and it has been working very well for both purposes highly recommend it. Monthly $ is little expensive. I am still worried of its future after cell phone lines changes its system such as some GPS companies that stopped their services recently.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Yudi Hida

customer_reviews.title: One of the best and accurate tracker devices I found to purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing tracking device, very accurate and small in size, also the software is easy to use and has good features. I also must mention that Amcrest has a great support, sales and management team, patient and dedicated to customers. I am very satisfied with the service and product quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shant

customer_reviews.title: Cheap monthly service plan. very accuate gun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, I use it on my sons classic car. Small, discrete device with long lasting battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Rojano

customer_reviews.title: Good tracking
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I use it to track the smaller land vehicles around town. Nice geo map.
customer_reviews.author: teresa m green

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great GPS! We use for our Trator Trailors, fully charged it usually lasts 5-6 days. Only con is it does have a 15min or so delay.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Martin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, reliable product
customer_reviews.text: This tracker is very accurate! It shows precise location, along with corresponding times of travel. I highly recommend this product to anyone who needs to keep track of someone else. Also, it is small and can easily be hidden in a vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Loooove it
customer_reviews.text: This tracker is so accurate and the battery life is amazing. You can watch and track from your phone when you download the app which is super convenient. I definitely recommend this tracker over all the other ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: It's step by step easy to setup, very nice quality to use in US, don't know yet if good for outside the country.
customer_reviews.author: MARCIO HAGIME YOSHIDA

customer_reviews.title: dont buy anymore
customer_reviews.text: this item is no good for nothing, i contact the tech and this item has bend use and can't use it any more, bad bad bad -10 start
customer_reviews.author: felix alvalle

customer_reviews.title: A the battery charged. if it’s hidden somewhere in the car the service can be hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for the most part. Only thing is I wish you could actually turn on and off the notifications they say off but I still get alerts. Also the service is not that good sometimes it freezes I can’t track anything it’ll be stuck at the last location and does not refresh for at least 24 hours. 😪
customer_reviews.author: Selecia G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and small size which will fit easily ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and small size which will fit easily in the car. Only thing is you need to buy subscription otherwise this will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Sachin

customer_reviews.title: That it will track and put you within feet of the actual location
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact that it’s small and you can get a good amount of tracking data on a single charge. Dislike that it takes to long for the system to active and that it only truly works with direct sunlight. So both make it hard to find a location on the vehicle without it being discovered.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: In poor coverage areas where my cell phone connects with one bar, this GPS dosent connect to cell service.
customer_reviews.author: Albert C.

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: this is literally a scamming company, DONT WASTE YOUR HARD EARNED COIN!
customer_reviews.author: amyyyy

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 trackers I use for my construction business. I can put them on trucks , tool trailers, and inside tools. There is a lot of theft these days and having these trackers will help you find your stuff after its stolen. Also excellent customer service and price.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: I need to return this item as it was larger than I had anticipated therefore useless for the purpose it had been intended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was looking forward to using this however that did not happened
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. The unit never worked. Three techs tried to help me reset the unit however the tracker kept showing that it was sitting in China.
customer_reviews.author: AMV

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy Issues
customer_reviews.text: I wish the GPS was more accurate. On occasion the GPS location is off by a 1/4 of a mile.
customer_reviews.author: Nvizion

customer_reviews.title: Not a good GPS
customer_reviews.text: Don't like it. It does not track in a glove box under the seat or any where in a car other than on the dash board. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Amcrest gps tracker!!
customer_reviews.text: This tracker is super!!! It has always worked great, tremendous coverage,and easy to charge. The Amcrest gps tracker has been a blessing for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, have them in 2 of my work vans. I can keep an eye on my driver’s so I know which one I can send to the next run
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Wisener

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Handy but batt life is 10 days not 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Christian potthoff

customer_reviews.title: Real time tracking limited to small coverage area
customer_reviews.text: Battery life not as advertised. Cut off alerts to motion only, but battery life only 3 days. Service coverage not very good in suburban/rural areas. The tracking would work but not until asset got back to the small areas of coverage.
customer_reviews.author: John Bedenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Dont work
customer_reviews.text: Can not get it to work on my Samsung s8 Very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: brian collier

customer_reviews.title: Good Customer Service @ Amcrest
customer_reviews.text: Just bought 2nd device, had technical issues while activating. Amcrest Technical support resolved my issue immediately. Was very happy with gps tracker and support from Santosh P. @ Amcrest. Susan
customer_reviews.author: francine fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Fleet Tracker
customer_reviews.text: Great pruduct I know where all my vehicles are at anytime.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Battery died in less then two months
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasted less then two months. Customer support dragged out replacing the device. So I opted to eat my losses and go with a different product. I can not support purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Helped track my golf clubs on a long international trip ...
customer_reviews.text: Helped track my golf clubs on a long international trip. Multiple flights and even shipped them at one point and Amcrest gave me the comfort of knowing where my clubs were at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hamann

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This device is accurate to a fault, it evens allows a panaramic view of the area. Long battery life. I would buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False advertising and does NOT work 75% of the time!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not use the ATT network as stated in the product description. Even when pointed to the open sky, the device will not connect to a cell tower in 75% of the areas making it a useless product. Supplier states they just stopped using ATT. Would not recommend as it is a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C. Albey

customer_reviews.title: Activation monthly payment required
customer_reviews.text: U have to pay more than 20 dollars a month to activate...does it mention this.
customer_reviews.author: Rani chahal

customer_reviews.title: Not happy either this product
customer_reviews.text: Peoducr works good at beginning then just not accurate. Extremely bad customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Huaman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and superb tech support
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and superb tech support. I would recommend also buying the in vehicle power supply so that no battery charging is ever required and also very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: It Works Well
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing so far. Gives me a pretty accurate location. Updates me about certain things i would like to know. Will def keep everyone updated.
customer_reviews.author: raymond

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: the product is good quality and easy to use. the app interface is really good..., the technicians are nice

customer_reviews.title: you say work and home driving 20 mins one way for some cheaper gas is smart. Shaking my Dreads
customer_reviews.text: Say no more .... you say work and home driving 20 mins one way for some cheaper gas is smart. Shaking my Dreads. With this product you will need some icecream, chips or transitional popcorn to see second by second activity from start to finsh with no problem. Moving way to fast down a hill or going up that same hill in slow motion. No escape viewing for 6 different electronics at the same time. Not fare for a lier or robbery that comes your way. 100% everytime KOBE for threeeee. Swisssssssssh GAME OVERR

customer_reviews.title: It worked. It's confusing at times discerning if the ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked. It's confusing at times discerning if the on/off button has actually turned it on or off.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: It will not hold a charge no matter how many times I charge it. Now it won’t even turn on. It’s a waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: Th GPS works great!
customer_reviews.text: The GPS works great. The battery only lasts about 2 weeks. I wish it would last longer. It is accurate and reliable. A good product.

customer_reviews.title: A little confusing
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad gps but there’s others that are better!

product_meta.title: Amcrest GPS Tracker - 2G Portable Mini GPS Tracking Device for Vehicles, Cars, Kids, Persons, Assets Hidden Tracker w/Geo-Fencing, Text/Email/Push Alerts, 14 Day Battery, Global, No Contract, AM-GL300
feature_bullets: COMPACT 2G GPS TRACKER – Excellent GPS tracking device for vehicles, loved ones (teens, spouses, children, elderly, pets) or anything you want to track.

REAL-TIME SMARTPHONE & PC TRACKING – This GPS tracker offers real-time tracking with up to 5-second updates through Windows and MAC desktop web-access (Chrome, Safari, Edge, Firefox) or through the Amcrest GPS smartphone app (iOS/Android). The intuitive user interface allows you to easily monitor activity, manage alerts and generate custom reports. Create links and share them with your friends, family and co-workers to keep track of cars, children, seniors and assets.

GEO-FENCING, SMART ALERTS & REPORTS - Create custom geo-fencing zones that alert you anytime the GPS tracker enters or exits a zone. Speed limit, harsh breaking, start/stop and proximity alerts allow you to easily track your vehicles and loved ones. Receive text, push and email notifications directly to your smartphone or PC with the Amcrest GPS app and desktop web-access client. Access your data with intelligent reporting directly from your iPhone, Android, Mac or PC.

BUILT TO LAST – GOOGLE MAPS – This Amcrest GPS Tracker is built to last with heavy-duty materials including an IPX5 water resistant housing as well as battery which lasts up to 10-14+ days on a full charge with 60sec updates (7-8 days with 30sec updates, 4-5 days with 15sec updates, and 2-3 days with 5sec updates). Utilizes Google Maps for tracking and mapping.

IMPORTANT - This device is configured to work in the US, Canada, and Mexico only. This device Does Not Work in Australia. We stand by our products and offer a lifetime warranty and unlimited support. In the event that your device produces undesirable results, we'll gladly refund 100% of your hardware and subscription charges.
